kpi.name: M1008C291

kpi_info.title: INTER FREQ HO ATTEMPTS FORCED BY BLOCK RESOURCE FOR RT
kpi_info.use: The number of Inter-frequency handover attempts due to normal priority block resource procedure for RT. UPDATED:When the RNC decides to make an Inter-frequency hard handover attempt forced by normal priority block resource procedure. In Inter-RNC case, the RNC sends RANAP: RELOCATION REQUIRED message to a core network. In Intra-RNC case, the RNC sends RRC: PHYSIOCAL CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION message to the UE. This counter is updated only when the trigger reason is forced IFHO due to normal priority block resource procedure for remaining UEs and for RT.

kpi.kpi_alias: INTER FREQ HO ATTEMPTS FORCED BY BLOCK RESOURCE FOR RT
